pageSubtitle: Supply assets to earn yield, or borrow against your collateral
noPositionsDescription: Supply assets or deposit collateral to borrow from a market above
connectWalletToView: Connect wallet to view your positions
step1Description: Deposit stablecoins or other assets to earn yield from borrowers.
step2Description: Lock LUX, PARS, or LP tokens as collateral to enable borrowing.
step3Description: Borrow up to the max LTV. Monitor your health factor to avoid liquidation.
step4Description: Repay debt to unlock collateral. Withdraw anytime with no lockup.
infoText: Lending data is loaded from Lux Liquid contracts. Connect your wallet to interact with markets. All Shariah-compliant markets use fee-based models (no interest/riba).
